Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cyanophlyctin beta (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (76.47%) toBrevinin-2ECActivity: Active against Gram- E. coli (MIC 5 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae PTCC1388 (MIC 10 ug/ml), B. cereus PTCC1247 (MIC 7 ug/ml), and S. aureus PTCC1431 (MIC 12 ug/ml).Toxicity: little hemo.lytic (0.7%) at 500 ug/ml.The original entry has been merged with AP579.
Literature Information.Author: Asoodeh A, Sepahi S, Ghorani-Azam A.2014
Literature Information.Reference: Chem Biol Drug Des. 2014 Apr;83(4):411-7. doi: 10.1111/cbdd.12256.Pub-Med.
Literature Information.Title: Purification and modeling amphipathic alpha helical antimicrobial peptides from skin secretions of Euphlyctis cyanophlyctis
